attributes.action: Abandon plans for a central database recording all telephone calls, emails and internet  access as this is a fundamental breach of  our cival liberties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A description of the proposals can be viewed here http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk_politics/7507627.stm which summarises the governments proposed communications data bill. The government is proposing to record details of all telephone calls, emails and internet access in a super database. This is another huge step towards a police state in a country that invented democracy and freedom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
